ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>

>
>From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
>
> I don't understand what you mean - perhaps you missed my point?
>
> I simply said that it's a hot-button issue. An issue that no
>argument
>or anything anyone says is going to change a another's strongly-held view
>on
>the subject. Regardless of what "side" people are on this issue - I've
>found that to be the case.
>
> This is true with any other hot-button issue: gun-control;
>welfare-reform, Chevy Vs Ford Trucks, whether Walter Payton or Barry
>Sanders
>is the best running-back of all time; etc etc etc.
>
> If you did understand my point - but feel the issue is so sensitive
>that
>it can't even be used as an analogy - I apologize for upsetting you.
>
>
>Slyde


You left one out PC vs Mac :p
